results.content:
The course looks like it was done in a single take. Its obvious there was not script or code pre-written. I had to watch and wait until design decisions were made and troubleshot was done during the recording. He can do better.

I don't mean to say there is no value to the course, however,  my expectations for a paid course have been set by other content in Udemy.

results.content: I was looking for a short course to learn sequelize quickly and then continue learning by writing small apps. This course was perfect for me.
results.content_html: I was looking for a short course to learn sequelize quickly and then continue learning by writing small apps. This course was perfect for me.

results.content:
I regret every cent spent on this course. Can't understand a thing the instructor says. Don't waste your money on this course, better read sequelize's documentation.

Edit: Completed 100% of the course, the concepts passed by the instructor are weak and not meant for a production stage software, I still regret every penny spent on it. Don't buy it.
